pandas can draw plot
```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
temperatures = [4.4,5.1,6.1,6.2,6.1,6.1,5.7,5.2,4.7,4.1,3.9,3.5]
s7 = pd.Series(temperatures, name="Temperature")
s7.plot()
plt.show()
```
